Tomb of Saintess: After seeing the coffin. Have you noticed the inscription: Here lies the Holy Solina who devoted his life to the kingdom Elmoreden, and death - Einhasad. Yes, she will sing a song of praise recovered by it. Yes die in the throes of death, turned away from the holy doctrine, or trying to get her strength.
